body.name: 10 Tier Shoe Storage Cabinet with Door, Portable Narrow Organizer Rack for 20 Pairs, White Plastic with Hooks for Entryway or Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 1 min
features: 【Great for Small Spaces】Size: 16"W x 12"D x 60"H, The 10 tiers white shoe rack for closet can hold 20 pairs of shoes. It can store all kinds of shoes, and also be a great closet storage organizer for your books and other stuff. The simple and elegant white design of the tall shoe rack for entryway makes your home look neat and clean, and the compact tall shoe organizer is perfect for closets, entryways, apartments, hallways, and can also be used as a garage shoe rack with cover for small spaces.

【Sturdy Material & Compact Structure】The cube shoe rack organizer for closet is made of the metal frame and environmentally friendly, harmless and durable PP material, the maximum load capacity of each cube: 11lbs. The tall shoe storage cabinet has the characteristics of firmness, stability and long life. The tall narrow shoe shelf with 10 hooks can be used to hang keys, umbrellas, bags, etc., which is very practical.

【Thoughtful Excellent Design】1.The shoe organizer for closet is effectively waterproof, dustproof, and easy to clean. 2.Modular design, the high heels can be placed very smoothly without falling. 3.The clear door helps you find your shoes quickly at a glance, 4.The door hole feature is designed for air circulation to prevent odor build-up. 5.The door opening design on the left side is easy to take without holding the door frame with one hand. 6.You can remove the dividers to fit the boots.

【Easy DIY Assembly】The entryway white shoe rack with doors can be easily assembled and disassembled in a short time. Provide a detailed installation manual and installation video, use the attached small wooden hammer to connect the connector and the module tightly together, you can split or combine it into the shape you need to suit your needs.

【Worry-Free Service】If there are any quality problems and problems with our free standing narrow shoe racks after purchase, please contact the after-sales service, we will provide you with free parts, replace it with new ones or refund according to the situation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1.Shoe storage are great for organizing your large collection of shoes and keeping your room tidy and mess-free. 2.Tall shoe rack narrow, perfect size for small spaces, can store 20 pairs of shoes, shoe rack organizer with 10 multi-purpose hooks. 3.The multifunctional adjustable shoe storage can store shoes, clothes, bags, and more, the hooks can hang keys, umbrellas. 4.White elegant minimalist design is perfect for storage in your closet, entryway, dorm room, apartment, garage and more.
Partition Installation(Keep the same direction) - Creating More Space

Warm tips: When preparing for assembly, please check the quantity of accessories according to the instructions before assembly.Use the attached mallet to assemble the product more securely and stably.It is recommended to wear gloves to protect yourself. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shoe Storage
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, sturdy, easy to assemble. Fits perfectly in the closet. Looks neat. Good storage solution for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and works exactly as I needed it to. Storage for my boyfriend and I's shoes as well as his work belts on one side and his hats on the other. It's sturdy enough if you aren't moving it around all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Looking Sturdy Shoe Rack
reviews.reviewText: This is a great shoe rack and is mostly sturdy - mostly unless someone knocks into it. The round pieces that hold the corners sometimes fall off when this happens. It’s not a hard fix, but a bit frustrating. I took off the doors because I’m usually in a hurry and it’s easier to access without the doors. I’ve had it for 4 months and it’s still as white as when I put it together. I have arthritis, so my son helped put some of the pieces on, but diagrams are provided and it was easy to put together. It holds a lot of shoes. I stacked my flip flops and sandals on top of each other for more room and was able to get 2 pair of booties in each cubicle. My son’s cowboy boots were too high for the cubicles, so we store his 2 pair of size 11s on top. I rated this 4 stars because the round corner connector pieces could be remade to stay on better and be more secure. I would buy it again though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for a small closet
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. does take some time to put together but it’s easy. the rack is still holding up well since i bought it in may 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks great
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together. I love how my closet looks now. My shoes are organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It did NOT come with all the parts
reviews.reviewText: This is a horrible product for many reasons. First, it was missing multiple pieces, so I couldn't finish building the entire rack. The directions were horrible. They just had blurry pictures with no text, so it was a guessing game trying to assemble it. The pieces are very difficult to attach and I ended up bruising my hands after building it. It's not sturdy like the pictures. So, I am left with a so-called shoe rack, unfinished piece of crap Please consider these facts before purchasing. I'm severly disappointed, to say the least. I would give it a zero star, but i'm forced to give it a 1 on their star choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed to organize my shoes
reviews.reviewText: Once you assemble the first one, you really get the hang of it quickly. I will say that they seem very durable for use however the likelihood that they would sustain being disassembled and reassembled again is low- the plastic connectors have their limits. This is exactly what I was looking for when it comes to being able to easily access and view all of my shoes. I was struggling with having everything in boxes to visualize everything I owned and this allows me to easily see and select what I need, and to put them back is a breeze vs. stacked shoe boxes and clutter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It was surprisingly easy to build after I watched the video. Pretty sturdy and actually looks like a nice shoe rack not an eye sore. I was worried it wouldn't be sturdy if I put heavier shoes at the top but it didnt wobble overall very happy with this purchase.
